name: carrotjuice-murder
description: This is a website to fight against the vegindustrial complex

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin project1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project1.html && usemin project2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project2.html && usemin project3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project3.html && usemin project4.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project4.html && usemin project5.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project5.html && usemin project6.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project6.html && usemin project7.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project7.html
